Interface Edge<V,​E>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the decorated vertex value
    E - the type of the decorated edge value
    All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Subinterfaces:

    public interface Edge<V,​E>
extends MetaTagCollection

    an edge has a source and a target
